content: **buy any 2 patterns and get 30% off** **granny chic airpods pouch pattern** **about the pattern ** keep your airpods safe and stylish with this adorable crochet airpods pouch designed to snugly fit your airpods case this pouch is both functional and fashionable it s the perfect quick project to use up those yarn scraps and makes a fantastic gift for friends and family **features** * skill level easy * finished size fits standard airpods and airpods pro cases * matching sunglasses case pattern 1 **materials needed ** * worsted weight yarn small amount * 4mm crochet hook * tapestry needle * scissors **pattern details ** this easy-to-follow pattern includes step-by-step instructions making it perfect for beginners the pouch is worked in the round and you ll only need basic crochet stitches for visual learners a comprehensive video tutorial 2 accompanies this pattern guiding you through each step to ensure a perfect finish **why you ll love it ** this crochet airpods pouch is not only practical but also a fun way to add a personal touch to your tech accessories customize it with your favorite colors for a unique touch whether you re making it for yourself or as a gift this pouch is sure to be a hit share your work we love seeing your creations share your finished pouches on social media with the hashtag #lullabylodge or join the ravelry group 3 to get exclusive sneak peaks at patterns before they are released and join in with pattern testing and fun cal s happy crocheting 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/granny-chic-shades-case 2 https //youtu be/apxinremjrm 3 https //www ravelry com/groups/lullaby-lodge-designs---ravelry-community-group
